 ```console

 $ sudo apt install python3-pip 
 $ git clone https://github.com/Marrk-85/MarkMusic
 $ cd MarkMusic 
 $ pip3 install -U -r requirements.txt 
 $ cd  MARKX
 $ cp config.py 

 ```
